${ModID}:WaterJet.NAME: Water Jet
${ModID}:WaterJet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard !M! card.

${ModID}:PoisonShard.NAME: Poison Shard
${ModID}:PoisonShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Deal !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Magic damage to it at the start of its turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: magic damage at the start of their turn.

${ModID}:ShatterShard.NAME: Shatter Shard
${ModID}:ShatterShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Whenever you discard !M! aqualancemod:Sigils in 1 turn, deal !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Magic damage.

${ModID}:BattlemageShard.NAME: Battlemage Shard
${ModID}:BattlemageShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Whenever you attack this enemy, deal !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Magic damage to it.

${ModID}:CatalystShard.NAME: Catalyst Shard
${ModID}:CatalystShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Whenever you apply a debuff to this enemy, deal !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Magic damage to it.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Whenever it receives a debuff, it takes

${ModID}:BombShard.NAME: Bomb Shard
${ModID}:BombShard.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Attuned !M!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: In !aqualancemod:M2! turns, deal !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Magic damage to the enemy and remove this aqualancemod:Shard.

${ModID}:LeechShard.NAME: Leech Shard
${ModID}:LeechShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Gain !M! Block whenever you attack this enemy.

${ModID}:ReverbShard.NAME: Reverb Shard
${ModID}:ReverbShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Deal !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Magic damage to it whenever you discard a card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #yMagic damage whenever you discard a card.

${ModID}:ChargedShard.NAME: Charged Shard
${ModID}:ChargedShard.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Attuned 2X. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Deal !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Magic damage every !M! card draws.

${ModID}:Flurry.NAME: Flurry
${ModID}:Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each debuff on the target.

${ModID}:Agony.NAME: Agony
${ModID}:Agony.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses 1 Strength for each aqualancemod:Shard. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable for each aqualancemod:Shard. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WaveMotion.NAME: Wave Motion
${ModID}:WaveMotion.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Bonus: !aqualancemod:M2! damage.

${ModID}:IronWave.NAME: Iron Wave
${ModID}:IronWave.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL aqualancemod:Bonus: !aqualancemod:M2! Block.

${ModID}:ChillingWave.NAME: Chilling Wave
${ModID}:ChillingWave.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! aqualancemod:Frostbite. NL aqualancemod:Bonus: !aqualancemod:M2! aqualancemod:Frostbite.

${ModID}:RideTheWave.NAME: Ride The Wave
${ModID}:RideTheWave.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL aqualancemod:Bonus: !aqualancemod:M2! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
NL Apply !M! aqualancemod:Frostbite to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Tsunami.NAME: Tsunami
${ModID}:Tsunami.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Apply !M! aqualancemod:Soaked to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:WaterBlast.NAME: Water Blast
${ModID}:WaterBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Lose !M! Block at the end of this turn.

${ModID}:Rapids.NAME: Rapids
${ModID}:Rapids.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, discard !M! random card to draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Rapids.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, discard !M! random card to draw !M! card.

${ModID}:Fog.NAME: Fog
${ModID}:Fog.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Enemy deals !M! less damage this turn.

${ModID}:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
${ModID}:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! aqualancemod:Hobble. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Pressure.NAME: Pressure
${ModID}:Pressure.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Pressure per debuff on the target. NL Target loses HP equal to their *Pressure.

${ModID}:Parry.NAME: Parry
${ModID}:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard !M! card.

${ModID}:WhirlpoolSigil.NAME: Whirlpool Sigil
${ModID}:WhirlpoolSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Deal !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Magic damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:RainSigil.NAME: Rain Sigil
${ModID}:RainSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:FloodSigil.NAME: Flood Sigil
${ModID}:FloodSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:WaterSigil.NAME: Water Sigil
${ModID}:WaterSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL ALL enemies deal !M! less damage this turn.

${ModID}:MarshSigil.NAME: Marsh Sigil
${ModID}:MarshSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:TsunamiSigil.NAME: Tsunami Sigil
${ModID}:TsunamiSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Deal aqualancemod:Magic damage to ALL enemies equal to !M! times the number of aqualancemod:Sigils discarded this combat ( !aqualancemod:D2! damage).

${ModID}:SteamBlast.NAME: Steam Blast
${ModID}:SteamBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable.

${ModID}:SteamWall.NAME: Steam Wall
${ModID}:SteamWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak and aqualancemod:Hobble.

${ModID}:Flak.NAME: Flak
${ModID}:Flak.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card, gain !M! Block.
${ModID}:Flak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Replenish. NL Whenever you discard a card, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Streamline.NAME: Streamline
${ModID}:Streamline.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Draw !aqualancemod:M2! additional cards next turn.

${ModID}:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
${ModID}:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play an attack each turn, draw !M! card.

${ModID}:PowerThrust.NAME: Power Thrust
${ModID}:PowerThrust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:Combo.NAME: Combo
${ModID}:Combo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a random aqualancemod:Shard from your discard pile.

${ModID}:DefensiveCombo.NAME: Defensive Combo
${ModID}:DefensiveCombo.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Play a random aqualancemod:Shard from your discard pile.

${ModID}:Surge.NAME: Surge
${ModID}:Surge.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! aqualancemod:Soaked to ALL enemies. NL Gain !aqualancemod:M2! aqualancemod:Intelligence. NL At the end of this turn, lose !aqualancemod:M2! aqualancemod:Intelligence.

${ModID}:Reckless.NAME: Reckless
${ModID}:Reckless.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and aqualancemod:Intelligence. NL Lose !aqualancemod:M2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:Spray.NAME: Spray
${ModID}:Spray.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your entire hand and gain !M! Block for each card discarded.

${ModID}:IceMastery.NAME: Ice Mastery
${ModID}:IceMastery.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, ALL enemies gain !M! aqualancemod:Frostbite for each aqualancemod:Shard in them.

${ModID}:PowerThrow.NAME: Power Throw
${ModID}:PowerThrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Discard !aqualancemod:M2! card. NL Discard !aqualancemod:M2! card next turn.

${ModID}:LashOut.NAME: Lash Out
${ModID}:LashOut.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Attuned !M!. NL Deal !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Magic damage. NL Discard !aqualancemod:M2! card. NL Discard !aqualancemod:M2! next turn.

${ModID}:Detonate.NAME: Detonate
${ModID}:Detonate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Magic damage to ALL enemies for each aqualancemod:Shard in the target. NL Remove all aqualancemod:Shards from the target.

${ModID}:Analyze.NAME: Analyze
${ModID}:Analyze.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! aqualancemod:Intelligence per aqualancemod:Shard in the target.
${ModID}:Analyze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! aqualancemod:Intelligence per aqualancemod:Shard in the target, +1.

${ModID}:IceArmor.NAME: Ice Armor
${ModID}:IceArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your intelligence at the end of your turn.

${ModID}:EnchantedSpear.NAME: Enchanted Spear
${ModID}:EnchantedSpear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This card gains bonuses from aqualancemod:Intelligence and aqualancemod:Soaked.

${ModID}:Speed.NAME: Speed
${ModID}:Speed.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and discard !M! card.
${ModID}:Speed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and discard !M! card.

${ModID}:FierceSkewer.NAME: Fierce Skewer
${ModID}:FierceSkewer.DESCRIPTION: Can only target enemies with at least !M! debuffs. NL Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:BloodBender.NAME: Blood Bender
${ModID}:BloodBender.DESCRIPTION: Deal !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Magic damage for each aqualancemod:Shard in the target. NL Remove all aqualancemod:Shards from the target.

${ModID}:WildStabs.NAME: Wild Stabs
${ModID}:WildStabs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Lose !aqualancemod:M2! Block at the end of your turn.

${ModID}:Drown.NAME: Drown
${ModID}:Drown.DESCRIPTION: Apply !aqualancemod:M2! Weak. NL Target deals !M! less damage this turn.

${ModID}:ColdHearted.NAME: Cold Hearted
${ModID}:ColdHearted.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:FlashFreeze.NAME: Flash Freeze
${ModID}:FlashFreeze.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Escalate.NAME: Escalate
${ModID}:Escalate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain !M! aqualancemod:Intelligence.
${ModID}:Escalate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain !M! aqualancemod:Intelligence. NL Gain !aqualancemod:M2! aqualancemod:Intelligence.

${ModID}:ElementalForm.NAME: Elemental Form
${ModID}:ElementalForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a card or discard a sigil, deal !M! aqualancemod:Magic damage to a random enemy.
${ModID}:ElementalForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card or discard a sigil, deal !M! aqualancemod:Magic damage to a random enemy.
